entry.title: Thursday: Partly cloudy. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
